definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

pinyin: Ma3 ke4 si1 Lie4 ning2 zhu3 yi4

definition: Karl Marx (1818-1883), German socialist philosopher, political activist and founder of Marxism
to die/lit. to visit Marx/to pass away

sentences.english: Marxism faith is magistral faith of China.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義信仰是中國社會的主導信仰。

sentences.english: Inculcation is the basic way of Marxist theory education.
sentences.chinese: 灌輸是馬克思主義政治教育的基本原則。

sentences.english: Second, the paper scrutinizes the Confucianists ideas in the way of the Marxism outlook .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是用馬克思主義觀點審視儒家德治思想。

sentences.english: Marx, with his usual perversity, thought it was both.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思，帶着慣常的倔強，認爲它兩者都是。

sentences.english: Marxism believes in the primacy of matter.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義相信物質是第一性的。

sentences.english: First, it inquires into Marx's conception of social development.
sentences.chinese: 首先探討了馬克思的社會發展論。

sentences.english: The Reception Study of Georg Lukács s Literature and Art Theory in China;
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義文藝理論是中國文藝理論的支柱和來源。
他們明目張膽地篡改馬克思主義。

sentences.english: Which indeed is approved by Marxism- Leninism?
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義到底贊成哪一個呢？

sentences.english: According to Marxist theory, the Concept of Life and Death is exactly the World Outlook.
sentences.chinese: 按照馬克思主義的說法，生死觀就是世界觀。

sentences.english: Practice-creation is the essence of Marx's freedom-living idea.
sentences.chinese: 實踐創生性是馬克思自由生存觀的本質。

sentences.english: But of what religion? The only faith confessed in Europe where a Higher Priest is present is Satanism .
sentences.chinese: 馬克思之妻稱他爲“高級牧師”，是哪個教的牧師呢？

sentences.english: By that time he already possessed a profound knowledge of Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 到這時，他對馬克思主義己經有了深刻了解。

sentences.english: Marks chart shows the effect on each individual.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思盤顯示出其對各人的影響。

sentences.english: The ideas of Marxism-Leninism point the way to victory.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思列寧主義思想指引著通向勝利的道路。

sentences.english: Leaping over Caudine Forks is a theoretical viewpoint put forth by Marx in his remaining you.
sentences.chinese: 跨越卡夫丁峽谷是馬克思晚年提出的一個理論觀點。

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
Honoré de Balzac (1799-1850), French novelist, author of series La comédie humaine
surname Adorno/Theodor Ludwig Wiesengrund Adorno 狄奧多·阿多諾|狄奥多·阿多诺[Di2 ao4 duo1 · A1 duo1 nuo4] (1903-1969), German sociologist, philosopher, musicologist, and composer
